name: The Nephite's End
description:
The Nephites (who are represented by yellow groups of soldiers), have gathered together for their last struggle against the Lamanites (who are represented by black groups of soldiers).  You are Mormon, The Chief Captain of the Nephites.  Though your people have cursed The Lord and are exceedingly wicked they look to you as though you can deliver them from their afflictions.

Left click - Command Nephite army or Target Lamanite army

Right click - Move Nephite army

Mouse Scroll - Zoom in or out

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move camera

Q - Throw spear

This game is on hold, but I would love to develop it further if I had the time for it!  If you would like to see a small update on this game I can work for hire.  Contact me at me@curtisjensen.com and I'd love to discuss the update and pricing.

😃

Just to give you an idea of the pricing, if I were to add textures to all the surfaces I would probably charge $20

If you want an extra challenge, try not using really overpowered tactics ;)
